alert.note: Alert for Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 1:46PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LAFAYETTE AND NORTHEASTERN DIXIE COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EST... At 146 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Wellborn to 13 miles west of Bell. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hatch Bend, Grady, Fletcher Springs, and Guaranto Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for Big Bend Florida.
